spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: The dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: Si the dragon falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The dragon pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Tuneladora
entries: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and can choose to leave a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two melee attacks, one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de tro.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Tota criatura designada pel drac que es trobi a 120 peus seus i que sàpiga de la seva presència ha de salvar per Saviesa {@dc 17}. Qui falli estarà {@condition frightened} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a dragon's Frightful Presence durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Alè de Debilitating {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a pulse of high-pitched, nearly inaudible sound in a 60-foot-cone. Each creature in that cone must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 45 ({@damage 13d6}) de dany de tro and is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

legendary.name: Atac de Cua
entries: El drac fa un atac amb la Cua.

legendary.name: Telekinetic Fling
entries: The dragon chooses a Small or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried that it can see within 60 feet of it, and magically hurls the object at a creature it can see within 60 feet of the object. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany contundent.

legendary.name: Teleportar (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The dragon magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it.
